about_the_game:
The games from FreeTimeDevelopment are made by a motivated solo indie game developer from Germany.

Explore endless procedurally generated dungeons in cube form with replay value, exciting atmosphere and unique design in 3D sci-fi style.

Each dungeon is a cube. Consisting of 6 sides (6 "biomes") and 16 rooms on each side. Filled with a wide variety of monsters / bosses and room types, difficult challenges but also many rewards await you. Visually, you will discover a lot of new things and a dungeon crawling experience like you've never had before.

Choose your favorite spaceship from five different classes, each of which offers different properties, and try to explore as much of the different dungeons as possible. There are currently five spaceships waiting for you, one spaceship per class. This will be expanded in the long term.

As if endless dungeons weren't enough - you also have the opportunity to explore each dungeon even further with the room cards that you can find. The room cards can be inserted into the dungeon to manipulate it. It is important where you insert the card (which depicts a new room). Be clever and try to find the room that activates the dungeon in order to unlock the best skills in the long term.

The seed system allows you to repeat the dungeon exactly, with visual elements changing intentionally so that even the repetition remains interesting. Challenge yourself and test how far you can get with new skills or different paths. Share the seed with your friends - maybe they'll take a different path?

The following 10 room types await you: Common, Room Card, Boss, Activation, Artifacts, Passive Gear, Active Gear, Treasury, Trader, Gaming.

The passive/active gear that you can find in the dungeons is controlled by a rarity system. There is Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic and Legendary.

The sophisticated buff system shows you everything important at all times. In addition, the player always has the option of seeing his properties and any changes to them.

Collect dark matter (permanent currency) and activate enough dungeons to unlock the best skills in the skill tree.

In the skill tree you will find important skills in the following areas: weaponry, shield, structure, technology, environment and universal. With these skills you should be well equipped to finally be able to defeat the strongest bosses and monsters.

Collect cube coins (temporary currency) in the dungeons to progress further with the various actions in the dungeon.

Gradually create your own universe, as the dungeons you play are statistically stored in your profile. This way, you always have an overview of your progress and can revisit dungeons you have played again.

The games from FreeTimeDevelopment are made by a motivated solo indie game developer from Germany.

Explore endless procedurally generated dungeons in cube form with replay value, exciting atmosphere and unique design in 3D sci-fi style.

Each dungeon is a cube. Consisting of 6 sides (6 "biomes") and 16 rooms on each side. Visually, you will discover a lot of new things and a dungeon crawling experience like you've never had before.

The following 10 room types await you: Common, Room Card, Boss, Activation, Artifacts, Passive Gear, Active Gear, Treasury, Trader, Gaming.

The passive/active gear that you can find in the dungeons is controlled by a rarity system. There is Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic and Legendary.

name: Cube Crawler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater

short_description: Take on the challenge and discover a completely new 3D sci-fi dungeon crawler. The sophisticated room card mechanics and endless generated dungeons with the form of a cube, this game is unique in this genre. What will you discover while exploring?
